titleStmt.title: An elegie upon the death of the mirrour of magnanimity, the right Honourable Robert Lord Brooke Lord Generall of the forces of the counties of VVarwick, and Stafford, who was slain by a musket shot at the siege of Liechfield, the second day of March, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Harington, Henry, fl. 1642.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Back blushing morne, to thine eternall bed,".
Signed at end: Ex opere (pr√¶sertim) Henrici Haringtoni, philologo.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
